message:
SYSTEM: 2020.03.OEG.pdf: Página 26
Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Doing a Predoctoral Research Stay but You Were Afraid to Ask
Research itself
26
Commonly recommended:
1st year:
Do whatever they want in destiny.
2nd/3rd year: 
Mutual collaboration, on your topic.
3rd/4th: 
Write thesis.
Non written rule: Who pays, rules:
- If you (UPM, you, home institution) funds, you choose.
- If host institution pays, agreement.
Obviously, the best is to collaborate in something you are interested
in.
My advice:
Discuss in advance what to do (Skype, previous collaboration…)
speaker: SYSTEM
